mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bms_user ( CREATE_TIME, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, PHONE_NUM ) VALUES ( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, VERSION, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, PHONE_NUM, AUTH_NUM FROM bms_user WHERE USERNAME=#{username}
SELECT ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, VERSION, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, PHONE_NUM, AUTH_NUM FROM bms_user WHERE USERNAME=#{username} AND PASSWORD=#{password}
